1_1_0_0: The world's ice is not melting
1_1_0_2: The world's snow cover is not melting
1_1_3_0: The Arctic sea ice is not vanishing
1_1_3_1: The Arctic sea ice is increasing
1_2_0_0: We are heading into an ice age
1_2_0_1: We are heading into a period of global cooling
1_3_0_0: The weather is cold therefore global warming is not happening
1_3_0_1: The weather is colder than in the past
1_3_0_2: The weather is exceptionally cold therefore global warming is not happening
1_3_0_3: It's snowing therefore global warming is not happening
1_3_0_4: It's snowing more than in the past
1_3_0_5: It's snowing an exceptional amount therefore global warming is not happening
1_4_0_0: The climate has not warmed over the last few decades
1_4_0_1: The climate has not changed over the last few decade
1_6_0_0: The rise of sea level is exaggerated
1_6_0_1: The rise of sea level is not accelerating
1_6_0_3: The rise of sea level is normal
1_6_0_4: Sea level rise is not related to climate change
1_7_0_2: Extreme weather is not linked to climate change

class_descr.1_2: We’re heading into an ice age/global cooling
class_descr.1_4: Climate hasn’t warmed/changed over the last (few) decade(s)
class_descr.1_6: Sea level rise is exaggerated/not accelerating
class_descr.1_7: Extreme weather isn’t increasing/has happened before/isn’t linked to climate change
